## MandeInstance.put() method

Sends a PUT request to the given url.

**Signature:**

```typescript
put<T = unknown, R extends ResponseAsTypes = 'json'>(data?: any, options?: Options<R>): MandeResponse<T, R>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | any | _(Optional)_ optional body of the request |
|  options | [Options](./mande.options.md)<!-- -->&lt;R&gt; | _(Optional)_ optional [Options](./mande.options.md) |

**Returns:**

[MandeResponse](./mande.manderesponse.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, R&gt;

## Example


```js
users.put('2', { name: 'Eduardo' }).then(user => {
  // do something
})
```
